EmailTemplate.name: Demo Request 24 Hour Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Demo Request out of SLA: Lead Company: {!Lead.Company}, Lead Name: {!Lead.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A demo request in your queue was not assigned to a member of the team within 24 hours. The request is for {!Lead.Name} with {!Lead.Company}. The link is below: https://acvauctions.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Lead/{!Lead.Id}/view
Thank You!
